trans-unit.source: Moves one or more files.

seg-source.mrk: Moves one or more files.

target.mrk: Moves one or more files.

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The source path and filename of the file to move. (* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

seg-source.mrk: The source path and filename of the file to move.
(* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

target.mrk: The source path and filename of the file to move.
(* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

trans-unit.source: The destination path and filename of the moved file. (* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

seg-source.mrk: The destination path and filename of the moved file.
(* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

target.mrk: The destination path and filename of the moved file.
(* wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

trans-unit.source: [optional] this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

target.mrk: [optional]
this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

trans-unit.source: Can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $FC_NOOVERWRITE (0) = (default) do not overwrite existing files.

seg-source.mrk: $FC_NOOVERWRITE (0) = (default) do not overwrite existing files.

target.mrk: $FC_NOOVERWRITE (0) = (default) do not overwrite existing files.

trans-unit.source: $FC_OVERWRITE (1) = overwrite existing files.

seg-source.mrk: $FC_OVERWRITE (1) = overwrite existing files.

target.mrk: $FC_OVERWRITE (1) = overwrite existing files.

trans-unit.source: $FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

seg-source.mrk: $FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

target.mrk: $FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

trans-unit.source: Constants are defined in FileConstants.au3.

seg-source.mrk: Constants are defined in FileConstants.au3.

target.mrk: Constants are defined in FileConstants.au3.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 if source cannot be moved or if dest already exists and flag=0.

seg-source.mrk: 0 if source cannot be moved or if dest already exists and flag=0.

target.mrk: 0 if source cannot be moved or if dest already exists and flag=0.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

seg-source.mrk: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

target.mrk: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

trans-unit.source: If the source and destination paths are on different volumes a copy and delete operation is performed rather than a move.

seg-source.mrk: If the source and destination paths are on different volumes a copy and delete operation is performed rather than a move.

target.mrk: If the source and destination paths are on different volumes a copy and delete operation is performed rather than a move.

trans-unit.source: Because AutoIt lacks a "FileRename" function, use FileMove() to rename a file!

seg-source.mrk: Because AutoIt lacks a "FileRename" function, use FileMove() to rename a file!

target.mrk: Because AutoIt lacks a "FileRename" function, use FileMove() to rename a file!

trans-unit.source: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

seg-source.mrk: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

target.mrk: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

trans-unit.source: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and prechecks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

seg-source.mrk: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and prechecks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

target.mrk: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and prechecks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

trans-unit.source: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.

seg-source.mrk: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.

target.mrk: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.
